Room.Name: Wall Road West
Room.ShortDescription: Wall Road West continues to the north and south.
Room.LongDescription: High overhead, there is a copper dragon and rider circling in preparation for landing at the pits, which is northeast of here. The high wall on the west side blocks any view in that direction, but you know there are low rolling hills that way, which eventually rise to the Nartiz Mountain Range. On the east side of the road there is a low fence enclosing the Animal Training Compound.
